profile_process_video::clip_card_2::goal: Show where the process is taking place.
profile_process_video::clip_card_1::goal: Show the very beginning or first step of the process.
profile_process_video::clip_card_8::goal: Capture your character as they complete the process. The more dramatic, the better.
profile_process_video::clip_card_5::goal: Show the next significant step in the process.
profile_process_video::clip_card_7::goal: If your story is about something your character does with an audience or people just watching, be sure to get a shot of their reaction.
profile_process_video::clip_card_0::goal: Show your character getting ready to start the process. How do they prepare?
profile_process_video::clip_card_4::goal: Show the next significant step in the process.
profile_process_video::clip_card_6::goal: Capture a clip that sums up the entire process.
profile_process_video::clip_card_3::goal: Show the next significant step in the process.
